verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> said <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Depart <WH3212> <WH8798>, and go up <WH5927> <WH8798> hence, thou and the people <WH5971> which thou hast brought up <WH5927> <WH8689> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, unto the land <WH776> which I sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto Avraham <WH85>, to Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and to Ya`akov <WH3290>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Unto thy seed <WH2233> will I give <WH5414> <WH8799> it:

And I will send <WH7971> <WH8804> an angel <WH4397> before <WH6440> thee; and I will drive out <WH1644> <WH8765> the Kanahanite <WH3669>, the Amorite <WH567>, and the Hittite <WH2850>, and the Perizzite <WH6522>, the Hivite <WH2340>, and the Y'vusi <WH2983>:

Unto a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>: for I will not go up <WH5927> <WH8799> in the midst <WH7130> of thee; for thou art a stiffnecked <WH7186> <WH6203> people <WH5971>: lest I consume <WH3615> <WH8762> thee in the way <WH1870>.
And when the people <WH5971> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> these evil <WH7451> tidings <WH1697>, they mourned <WH56> <WH8691>: and no man <WH376> did put <WH7896> <WH8804> on him his ornaments <WH5716>.

For the YY <WH3068> had said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Say <WH559> <WH8798> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Ye are a stiffnecked <WH7186> <WH6203> people <WH5971>: I will come up <WH5927> <WH8799> into the midst <WH7130> of thee in a <WH259> moment <WH7281>, and consume <WH3615> <WH8765> thee: therefore now put off <WH3381> <WH8685> thy ornaments <WH5716> from thee, that I may know <WH3045> <WH8799> what to do <WH6213> <WH8799> unto thee.
And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> stripped <WH5337> <WH8691> themselves of their ornaments <WH5716> by the mount <WH2022> Horev <WH2722>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the tabernacle <WH168>, and pitched <WH5186> <WH8804> it without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>, afar off <WH7368> <WH8687> from the camp <WH4264>, and called <WH7121> <WH8804> it the Tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>. And it came to pass, that every one which sought <WH1245> <WH8764> the YY <WH3068> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> unto the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, which was without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264>.

And it came to pass, when Mosheh <WH4872> went out <WH3318> <WH8800> unto the tabernacle <WH168>, that all the people <WH5971> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799>, and stood <WH5324> <WH8738> every man <WH376> at his tent <WH168> door <WH6607>, and looked <WH5027> <WH8689> after <WH310> Mosheh <WH4872>, until he was gone <WH935> <WH8800> into the tabernacle <WH168>.

And it came to pass, as Mosheh <WH4872> entered <WH935> <WH8800> into the tabernacle <WH168>, the cloudy <WH6051> pillar <WH5982> descended <WH3381> <WH8799>, and stood <WH5975> <WH8804> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168>, and the YY talked <WH1696> <WH8765> with Mosheh <WH4872>.

And all the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> <WH8804> the cloudy <WH6051> pillar <WH5982> stand <WH5975> <WH8802> at the tabernacle <WH168> door <WH6607>: and all the people <WH5971> rose up <WH6965> <WH8804> and worshipped <WH7812> <WH8694>, every man <WH376> in his tent <WH168> door <WH6607>.

And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto Mosheh <WH4872> face <WH6440> to face <WH6440>, as a man <WH376> speaketh <WH1696> <WH8762> unto his friend <WH7453>. And he turned again <WH7725> <WH8804> into the camp <WH4264>: but his servant <WH8334> <WH8764> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, a young man <WH5288>, departed <WH4185> <WH8686> not out <WH8432> of the tabernacle <WH168>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, See <WH7200> <WH8798>, thou sayest <WH559> <WH8802> unto me, Bring up <WH5927> <WH8685> this people <WH5971>: and thou hast not let me know <WH3045> <WH8689> whom thou wilt send <WH7971> <WH8799> with me. Yet thou hast said <WH559> <WH8804>, I know <WH3045> <WH8804> thee by name <WH8034>, and thou hast also found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in my sight <WH5869>.

Now therefore, I pray thee, if I have found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>, shew <WH3045> <WH8685> me now thy way <WH1870>, that I may know <WH3045> <WH8799> thee, that I may find <WH4672> <WH8799> grace <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>: and consider <WH7200> <WH8798> that this nation <WH1471> is thy people <WH5971>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, My presence <WH6440> shall go <WH3212> <WH8799> with thee, and I will give thee rest <WH5117> <WH8689>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, If thy presence <WH6440> go <WH1980> <WH8802> not with me, carry us not up <WH5927> <WH8686> hence.

For wherein shall it be known <WH3045> <WH8735> here <WH645> that I and thy people <WH5971> have found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>? is it not in that thou goest <WH3212> <WH8800> with us? so shall we be separated <WH6395> <WH8738>, I and thy people <WH5971>, from all the people <WH5971> that are upon the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, I will do <WH6213> <WH8799> this thing <WH1697> also that thou hast spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>: for thou hast found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in my sight <WH5869>, and I know <WH3045> <WH8799> thee by name <WH8034>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I beseech thee <WH4994>, shew <WH7200> <WH8685> me thy glory <WH3519>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will make all my goodness <WH2898> pass <WH5674> <WH8686> before thee, and I will proclaim <WH7121> <WH8804> the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> before <WH6440> thee; and will be gracious <WH2603> <WH8804> to whom I will be gracious <WH2603> <WH8799>, and will shew mercy <WH7355> <WH8765> on whom I will shew mercy <WH7355> <WH8762>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thou canst <WH3201> <WH8799> not see <WH7200> <WH8800> my face <WH6440>: for there shall no man <WH120> see <WH7200> <WH8799> me, and live <WH2425> <WH8804>.
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, there is a place <WH4725> by me, and thou shalt stand <WH5324> <WH8738> upon a rock <WH6697>:

And it shall come to pass, while my glory <WH3519> passeht by <WH5674> <WH8800>, that I will put <WH7760> <WH8804> thee in a clift <WH5366> of the rock <WH6697>, and will cover <WH5526> <WH8804> thee with my hand <WH3709> while <WH5704> I pass by <WH5674> <WH8800>:
And I will take <WH5493> <WH8689> away mine hand <WH3709>, and thou shalt see <WH7200> <WH8804> my back parts <WH268>: but my face <WH6440> shall not be seen <WH7200> <WH8735>.
